original_text: On the eighth day, he must come in front of the Lord. He must take two birds to the door of the Tent of Meeting. They must be doves or pigeons. He must give them to the priest.
korean_text: 여덟째 날에 산비둘기 두 마리나 집비둘기 새끼 두 마리를 자기를 위하여 가져다가 회막 문 여호와 앞으로 가서 제사장에게 줄 것이요

sentences.original_text: he must come in front of the Lord

sentences.korean_translation: 그는 두 마리의 새를 가져가야 합니다

sentences.original_text: to the door of the Tent of Meeting
They must be doves or pigeons
He must give them to the priest
